egyptianLaw.title: Chat with Egyptian Law
egyptianLaw.subtitle: Explore and ask questions about Egypt's major legal codes. Our AI assistant will help you understand the laws, find relevant articles, and explain legal concepts.
egyptianLaw.aboutDescription: These are the official Egyptian legal codes that have been pre-loaded into our system. You can ask questions in English or Arabic, and our AI will provide relevant information with citations to specific articles and sections. Please note that this is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice.

constitution.title: The Constitution
constitution.description: The supreme law of Egypt, establishing the framework for government and protecting fundamental rights and freedoms of citizens.

labor-law.title: Labor Law
labor-law.description: Governs employment relationships, workers' rights, working conditions, wages, and labor disputes in Egypt.

civil-code.title: The Civil Code
civil-code.description: The foundation of private law in Egypt, covering contracts, property, obligations, and civil liability.

tax-procedures.title: Unified Tax Procedures Law
tax-procedures.description: Regulates tax assessment, collection, and appeals procedures, as well as rights and obligations of taxpayers.

penal-code.title: Penal Code
penal-code.description: Defines criminal offenses and their penalties, protecting society and ensuring justice in criminal matters.
